text: Yā pana bhikkhunī ajjhokāse purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭheyya vā sallapeyya vā pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī ajjhokāse purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭheyya vā sallapeyya vā pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 13. Should any bhikkhunī stand or converse with a man, one on one, in the open air, it is to be confessed.
